abstract: Danilo Perez, pianist, composer and founder of the Panama Jazz Festival, promotes music in his native Panama in effort to unify culture and provide hope to young people; in addition to festival, Perez has also set up a foundation for music education and outreach and opened a jazz-focused venue called Danilo's Jazz Club.
lead_paragraph: In his native Panama, the pianist Danilo Pérez spearheads a festival, a foundation and a jazz club, as well as musical opportunities for Panama’s youth.
snippet: In his native Panama, the pianist Danilo Pérez spearheads a festival, a foundation and a jazz club, as well as musical opportunities for Panama’s youth.

headline.main: Aiming to Create a Jazz Capital
headline.seo: Danilo Pérez Builds a Magnet for Musicians in Panama
headline.print_headline: Aiming to Create a Jazz Capital
